Control Name: AUDIT REVIEW, ANALYSIS, AND REPORTING | CENTRAL REVIEW AND ANALYSIS
Control Statement: The information system provides the capability to centrally review and analyze audit records from multiple components within the system.Supplemental Guidance:  Automated mechanisms for centralized reviews and analyses include, for example, Security Information Management products. Related controls: AU-2, AU-12.
